resources.string: Main Activity: If I click the Search button, I\'m going to find the music I\'m listening to. Chronology button shows songs I\'ve already found.

List of the songs I\'ve already found: each row contains song\'s image, song title and artist\'s name. If I click on row, I\'ll jump into songs details activity. By the way, I\'ve added a detail song button.

I decided to use PayPal Android SDK (https://github.com/paypal/PayPal-Android-SDK) as a payment method for purchasing songs: I like use this payment method, because it\'s safe and very easy to use. The minimum requirements are Android 4.1.x (API 16) or later for Phone or tablet. The only thing left is to implement it =)
This activity shows the detail of the song found: it displays large image, with title and artist details. Here there\'s also purchase button to buy the song.
This activity shows the search for the song. Once the song is found, it will automatically go into song detail.
